title: Decoy S01E24_E25 DVDRip DivX
description:
Decoy Season 1 (1957-58)
S01E24 Saturday Was Lost, S01E25 High Swing
"Decoy" starred Beverly Garland as Patricia "Casey" Jones, an no-nonsense undercover police officer with the New York Police Department, the antithesis of June Cleaver. A U.S. television drama broadcast 1957-58, Decoy was an excellent, ahead-of-its-time show in the style of Dragnet, complete with Garland providing a Jack Webb-style narration. 

Ms. Garland is ofen required, in her role as undercover policewoman Patricia "Casey" Jones, to play a different role in each of the 39 episodes filmed, the "decoy". The episodes focused on women being victimized by crime, and Policewoman Casey Jones&#039; efforts to right wrongs. The cast changed each week with Garland the only main continuing character. 

Decoy is of historical significance as it was the first American television series to focus on the work of a female police officer. The series also featured early performances by actors such as Larry Hagman, Peter Falk, Al Lewis and Martin Balsam. Each episode was dedicated to the Bureau of Policewomen of the New York Police Department.

About a dozen Decoy shows have been released to DVD, with varying video and audio quality. It&#039;s a shame that this show was not shown the care in remastering that other shows of this time period were shown. Quality notwithstanding, the shows are well-written and well-acted with good plot and storylines and are extremely watchable. It&#039;s Beverly Garland as I think she really was, tough, gritty, and caring - before she became Tv&#039;s favorite wife and mother.


S01E24 Saturday Was Lost 
First aired: 3/24/1958 
During a murder investigation, Casey arrests a drug-addicted young woman who has lost her memory after an all-night pot party. Larry Hagman guest stars.

Starring Beverly Garland as Patricia "Casey" Jones

Guest star: Barbara Lord, Simon Oakland, Larry Hagman 
Writer: Leon Tokatyan 
Director: Stuart Rosenberg

S01E25 High Swing 
First aired: 3/31/1958 
Casey goes undercover and acts as bait to befriend a seemingly benign elderly couple who are actually plotting a series of muggings and robberies.

Starring Beverly Garland as Patricia "Casey" Jones

Guest star: Edith Atwater, Albert Dekker 
Writer: Don Ettlinger 
Director: David Alexander
